scheduleDialog.info: The version will be published automatically at the scheduled time. You can cancel anytime before then.

warnings.noDocumentTypeDescription: This template has a published version but no document type. It won't be found via the internal render API.

import.title: Import Document
import.description: Import a document from JSON file
import.fileTabDescription: Click to select or drag file here
import.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Only .json files are accepted
import.jsonValid: JSON is valid and ready to import
import.criticalErrors: The document has critical errors that must be fixed before importing.
import.nonCriticalWarnings: The document has non-critical warnings. You can import it anyway.
import.documentValid: The document is valid and ready to import.
import.documentPassedValidation: The document passed all validations successfully.

workspace.label: Workspace
workspace.title: Members
workspace.description: Manage workspace members and their roles.

add.title: Add Member
add.description: Add a user by email and assign a role.

remove.title: Remove Member
remove.confirm: Are you sure you want to remove {{name}}? This action cannot be undone.

roleDescriptions.SUPERADMIN: Full platform access. Manage tenants, system users, and global settings.
roleDescriptions.PLATFORM_ADMIN: Read-only access to tenants and system injectables.
roleDescriptions.TENANT_OWNER: Full tenant management. Create workspaces, manage members and settings.
roleDescriptions.TENANT_ADMIN: Read-only access to tenant info, workspaces, and members.
roleDescriptions.OWNER: Full workspace management. Manage members, roles, and all content.
roleDescriptions.ADMIN: Manage content, publish versions, invite members, and delete items.
roleDescriptions.EDITOR: Create and edit templates, versions, folders, tags, and variables.
roleDescriptions.OPERATOR: Generate PDFs from published templates. Read-only access to content.
roleDescriptions.VIEWER: Read-only access to all workspace content.

error.alreadyExists: This user is already a member

variables.emptyHint: Create your first variable to use in templates
variables.label: Display Label

documentTypes.noResults: No document types match your search

form.codeHint: Only uppercase letters, numbers, and underscores

form.codeExists: A document type with this code already exists

delete.forceHint: Templates will have no document type assigned

tenants.description: Manage tenant organizations and their configurations.

form.name: Name
form.nameTooLong: Name must be 100 characters or less
form.codeInvalid: Code must contain only letters, numbers, and underscores
form.codeExists: A tenant with this code already exists

archive.title: Archive Tenant
archive.confirm: Are you sure you want to archive "{{name}}"?
archive.description: This will hide the tenant from all users. The data will be preserved and can be restored by an administrator.

form.createDescription: Create a new workspace for this tenant.
form.name: Name
form.codeInvalid: Code must contain only letters, numbers, and underscores
form.codeExists: A workspace with this code already exists
form.nameTooShort: Name must be at least 3 characters
form.nameTooLong: Name must be 255 characters or less
form.editContextError: Cannot edit workspace outside its context

archive.title: Archive Workspace
archive.confirm: Are you sure you want to archive "{{name}}"?
archive.warning: This workspace may contain templates and documents that will become inaccessible.
archive.description: Archiving will hide this workspace from all users. The data will be preserved and can be restored by an administrator.

users.description: Manage system users and their roles.

systemInjectables.description: Manage system-level injectable functions and their availability scopes.
systemInjectables.readOnlyWarning: You have read-only access. Only SUPERADMIN can modify settings.
systemInjectables.globalHint: Add assignments to restrict availability to specific scopes
systemInjectables.createAssignmentDesc: Assign this injectable to a specific scope

bulk.confirmActivateDescription: The following {{count}} injectables will be activated globally:
bulk.warningActivate: Activated injectables will be available for assignment to workspaces.
bulk.confirmDeactivateDescription: The following {{count}} injectables will be deactivated globally:
bulk.warningDeactivate: Deactivated injectables will not be available in any workspace, regardless of their assignments.
bulk.confirmMakePublicDescription: The following {{count}} injectables will be made PUBLIC:
bulk.confirmRemovePublicDescription: PUBLIC access will be removed from the following {{count}} injectables:
bulk.warningMakePublic: PUBLIC injectables are available to ALL workspaces without explicit assignments.
bulk.warningRemovePublic: Removing PUBLIC access will restrict these injectables to their scoped assignments only.
bulk.assignScopeDescription: Create scope assignments for {{count}} selected injectables.
bulk.removeScopeDescription: Remove scope assignments from {{count}} selected injectables.
bulk.warningAssign: This will make the selected injectables available at the chosen scope.
bulk.warningRemoveAssign: This will remove the assignments, potentially restricting injectable availability.
